title: WebMCP Manifest v0.1
description: Specification for /.well-known/webmcp.json â€” a machine-readable manifest that advertises MCP-compatible tools exposed by a web origin.

manifest_version.description: The version of the WebMCP manifest specification this document conforms to.

origin.description: The canonical HTTPS origin that serves this manifest. Must match the origin of the /.well-known/webmcp.json URL.

tools.description: The set of tools this origin exposes to MCP-compatible agents.

auth.description: Authentication requirements for invoking the tools declared in this manifest.

attestation.description: Optional cryptographic attestation that allows agents to verify the manifest has not been tampered with.

name.description: A unique, snake_case identifier for the tool. Must be unique within this manifest.

description.description: A human- and agent-readable description of what the tool does, its side effects, and when to use it.

input_schema.description: A JSON Schema (draft 2020-12 compatible) object describing the tool's input parameters.

output_schema.description: A JSON Schema (draft 2020-12 compatible) object describing the shape of the tool's successful response.

risk_level.description: Declares the risk tier of the tool. low = read-only/informational. medium = writes data the user owns. high = financial transactions or irreversible mutations. critical = security-sensitive operations (delete account, transfer ownership).

requires_user_confirm.description: When true, the agent MUST present the tool invocation to the user for explicit approval before executing.

pricing.description: Describes the cost model for invoking this tool.

tags.description: Freeform tags for discovery and categorization. Lowercase, hyphens and underscores allowed.

version.description: Semantic version of this individual tool (e.g. "1.0.0"). Independent of manifest_version.

model.description: The pricing model. free = no cost. freemium = free tier with paid upgrades. paid = requires active subscription. per_call = billed per invocation.

cost_estimate.description: Optional human-readable cost hint, e.g. "$0.01 per call" or "Free up to 100 calls/day".

requires_login.description: Whether invoking any tool in this manifest requires an authenticated session.

oauth_scopes.description: OAuth 2.0 scopes the agent should request when authenticating. Only meaningful when requires_login is true.

Attestation.description: Cryptographic attestation allowing agents to verify manifest integrity.

public_key_jwk.description: The public key in JWK (RFC 7517) format used to verify the signature.

crv.description: Curve name, required for EC and OKP keys.

y.description: Y coordinate (base64url), required for EC keys.

signature.description: Base64url-encoded signature over the canonical JSON serialization of the fields listed in signed_fields.

signed_fields.description: Top-level manifest fields included in the signature. The signature is computed over the JSON-canonicalized (RFC 8785) concatenation of these fields in the order listed.

JsonSchemaObject.description: An inline JSON Schema object describing a tool parameter or response shape. Must be of type "object".
